/**
 * DSS – canonical UTC timestamp converter
 *
 * ACCEPTĂ:
 *  - string: "2026-01-12" + "14:00"
 *  - number: millis (assumed local → converted)
 *  - Date object (local → converted)
 *
 * RETURN:
 *  - UTC timestamp (ms)
 */export function toUtcTs(input){let time=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;// Case 1: date + time strings
if(typeof input==='string'&&time){// e.g. input="2026-01-12", time="14:00" => UTC is T..:00Z
return Date.parse("".concat(input,"T").concat(time,":00Z"));}// Case 2: ISO string already UTC
if(typeof input==='string'&&input.endsWith('Z')){return Date.parse(input);}// Case 3: millis (local)
if(typeof input==='number'){const d=new Date(input);return Date.UTC(d.getFullYear(),d.getMonth(),d.getDate(),d.getHours(),d.getMinutes(),d.getSeconds(),d.getMilliseconds());}// Case 4: Date object (local)
if(input instanceof Date){return Date.UTC(input.getFullYear(),input.getMonth(),input.getDate(),input.getHours(),input.getMinutes(),input.getSeconds(),input.getMilliseconds());}throw new Error('toUtcTs: unsupported input');}export function fromUtcTs(ts){return new Date(ts);// DOAR UI
}
